import React from "react"; import Card from "../UI/Card/Card"; import classes from "./PokemonInformation.module.css"; const pokemonInformation = props => (
{/*
One of three columns
{props.pokemonName}
Dex #{props.pokemonNumber}
*/} {/*

text

{props.pokemonName}

Dex #{props.pokemonNumber}

*/}

{props.pokemonName}

Dex #{props.pokemonNumber}

{/* */}
{/*

Type

Weight

Height

*/} {/*
Type

here the typing will go

Weight

here the weight will go

Height

here the Height will go

*/}
{/* */}
Pokemon Max CP: {props.maxCP}
{/*
2000
*/}
Base HP: {props.hp}
Base ATK: {props.atk}
Base DEF: {props.def}
{/*
Pokemon Max CP: {props.maxCP}
2000
Base HP: {props.hp}
Base ATK: {props.atk}
Base DEF: {props.def}
*/} {/*
*/} {/*
*/} {/*
//
//
//
//
Height
//

here the height will go

//
//
//
*/}
); export default pokemonInformation;
